description: List all tags added to the specified Amazon SNS topic. For an overview, see Amazon SNS Tags in the Amazon Simple Notification Service Developer Guide.

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the topic for which to list tags.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: The tags associated with the specified topic.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The required key portion of the tag.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The optional value portion of the tag.
